help.title: Share your email with us
help.message:
Accepting will share your email with us and allow us to contact you based on your Surf usage. No spam, we promise.

(Surf will restart after accepting.)

language.label: Language
language.description: Choose the language used throughout Surf.

darkMode.title: Dark mode
darkMode.description: Enable dark appearance for the application.

teletype.title: TeleType default action
teletype.description: Choose how the command bar selects actions by default.

auto.label: Auto (smart)
auto.description: Automatically select based on query type.

ask.label: Always ask Surf
ask.description: Always default to the Ask Surf action.

search.label: Always web search
search.description: Always default to the Search Web action.

smartNotes.title: Surf Notes
smartNotes.description: Access context-aware Surf AI features like auto-completion, citation generation, and more directly within your Surf notes.

sidebar.title: Notes sidebar
sidebar.description: Create and view Surf notes in the sidebar, replacing the old chat interface.

dialog.enableMessage: Surf needs to restart to enable the experimental notes sidebar.
dialog.disableMessage: Surf needs to restart to return to the chat sidebar.

chatInput.title: Sidebar chat input (experimental)
chatInput.description: Show a traditional chat input in the notes sidebar.

contextLinking.title: Linked contexts
contextLinking.description: Link contexts together to easily navigate between them.

activeModel.title: Active model
activeModel.description: Your selected model is used across Surf. We may switch to more efficient options from the same provider for certain features.

configure.title: Configure models
configure.description: Provide an API key for built-in providers or add your own custom models.

claude.description: uses the official Claude SDK with file system access. Choose a specific model (Sonnet 4.5 or Haiku 4.5) or use “Auto” to let the SDK decide.
claude.recommendation: Claude Code Agent Haiku 4.5 for faster responses and lower cost.

customModels.title: Custom models
customModels.empty: No custom models configured yet. Add one to get started.

fields.label: Model label
fields.labelHelp: Give your custom model a name so you can identify it within Surf's UI.
fields.providerModelHelp: The ID of the model from the provider's API.
fields.endpointHelp: Full URL of the model provider's OpenAI-compatible API endpoint.
fields.contextSizeHelp: Maximum number of tokens the model supports.
fields.supportsVisionHelp: Whether the model supports vision features like image tagging.
fields.supportsJsonHelp: Whether the model supports returning JSON-formatted output.

languageSaved.title: Language updated
languageSaved.message: Your language preference has been saved.
